text: Hi, my name is Awaiz Khan.

I'm a Principal Solutions
architect in AWS.

This solution is with Stanford
Medical and T-Mobile

and Celona. So this interconnectivity
has been a challenge

for enterprises for a while,
and distributed ACT systems

and wifi are not able
to solve the challenge.

So here AWS has worked with
T-Mobile, Stanford Medical,

and Celona to create a solution
to solve this challenge.
Stanford Medical wanted

to solve interconnectivity
challenges in their
medical facilities.

So we worked with Celona
to create a solution
that runs on AWS infrastructure.
That is AWS outpost.
The problem statement here was
that the patient's connectivity devices
and indoor connectivity
inside the buildings was a big challenge
that they wanted to solve for.

So the solution here is
a neutral host solution
that basically can connect to a public

and private network simultaneously,
public network users,

when they walk into San
Juan medical facilities,

they can connect to the system
and also the private users,
or they can connect to the system.
Now, the actual solution is

where the devices starting
from the left hand side

of this diagram, they can
connect to Celona access points,

which are the radios, and they
connect to the AWS Outpost,

which is the AWS infrastructure
running the 5G core network.
This is where all the Edge applications
and the 5G core network runs

and also the mobile device
management systems are running.

This is where the enterprise,
it can actually activate a lot

of the devices for the new
users that are coming in
and out of the system.

The system seamlessly
connects to the T-Mobile core

for authentication of
public network users,
and it uses local authentication methods
for private network users.
Now, as you can see,

this is all being all running
on AWS infrastructure,
which basically is helping to deploy these
private networks in a seamless fashion.

AWS Private Wireless is an
offering that we have worked

with a lot of CSPs, launched
in 2023 World, world Congress.

This year, we have
increased the scope of this

integrated private wire
offering, including Amdocs
and Celona here.

This was the demo for the
interconnectivity challenges that
AWS Integrated Private Wireless has solved
for Stanford Medical.
Thank you.
